data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 26049, Version Hash: 21b20081da6cede396ca25b8e4e9cf3df4ecbc25
data.actual_result: The slowmode setting briefly flashes its previous setting, even if "save changes" button was hit first.
data.expected_result: The slowmode bar should stay put at its new changed setting.
data.short_description: The slowmode slider briefly flashes its previous setting when hitting reset after pressing "save changes".
data.steps_to_repro: - Change the slowmode setting to any point on the slider. - Click "Save Changes". - Immediately hit "Reset" before the 'unsaved changes' bar disappears.
